explanation: [0-0] A man with a beard, wearing a headscarf and a long grey robe, sits on the ground with his head bowed. He presses down on a watermelon with his left hand and holds a knife to it with his right hand.

[0-6] The man in grey cuts open the large watermelon to reveal a small watermelon inside. He picks up the small watermelon with both hands and looks at it in confusion. Then, he holds the small watermelon in his left hand and cuts it open with the knife in his right hand. He reaches into the small watermelon with his left hand.
